IFunctionOperations IFunctionOperations Interface

In this Article

Edit

Operations for managing the function(s) of the stream analytics job.

Syntax

Declaration

public interface IFunctionOperationsPublic Interface IFunctionOperations

Methods summary

BeginTestConnectionAsync(String, String, String, CancellationToken)
